001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.button;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.AbstractComponentService;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.ComponentType;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.factory.ComponentFactory;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.log.LogUi;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
009import org.openqa.selenium.By;
010
011/**
012 * Provides service-level operations for interacting with button components.
013 *
014 * <p>This class manages button interactions (clicks, state checks, and table insertions)
015 * by delegating to the appropriate {@link Button} implementation based on the
016 * provided {@link ButtonComponentType}.
017 *
018 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
019 */
020public class ButtonServiceImpl extends AbstractComponentService<ButtonComponentType, Button> implements ButtonService {
021
022   /**
023    * Constructs a new ButtonServiceImpl using the specified SmartWebDriver.
024    *
025    * @param driver the SmartWebDriver used for UI interactions.
026    */
027   public ButtonServiceImpl(SmartWebDriver driver) {
028      super(driver);
029   }
030
031   /**
032    * Creates a new Button instance for the given component type.
033    *
034    * @param componentType the button component type.
035    * @return a new or cached Button instance.
036    */
037   @Override
038   protected Button createComponent(final ButtonComponentType componentType) {
039      return ComponentFactory.getButtonComponent(componentType, driver);
040   }
041
042   /**
043    * Clicks a button with the specified text inside a container.
044    *
045    * @param componentType the button component type.
046    * @param container     the container holding the button.
047    * @param buttonText    the text of the button to click.
048    */
049   @Override
050   public void click(final ButtonComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
051                     final String buttonText) {
052      LogUi.step("Clicking button: " + buttonText + " in container");
053      buttonComponent(componentType).click(container, buttonText);
054   }
055
056   /**
057    * Clicks a button inside a container.
058    *
059    * @param componentType the button component type.
060    * @param container     the container holding the button.
061    */
062   @Override
063   public void click(final ButtonComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container) {
064      LogUi.step("Clicking button in container");
065      buttonComponent(componentType).click(container);
066   }
067
068   /**
069    * Clicks a button identified by its text.
070    *
071    * @param componentType the button component type.
072    * @param buttonText    the text of the button to click.
073    */
074   @Override
075   public void click(final ButtonComponentType componentType, final String buttonText) {
076      LogUi.step("Clicking button: " + buttonText);
077      buttonComponent(componentType).click(buttonText);
078   }
079
080   /**
081    * Clicks a button identified by a locator.
082    *
083    * @param componentType the button component type.
084    * @param buttonLocator the locator for the button.
085    */
086   @Override
087   public void click(final ButtonComponentType componentType, final By buttonLocator) {
088      LogUi.step("Clicking button using locator: " + buttonLocator);
089      buttonComponent(componentType).click(buttonLocator);
090   }
091
092   /**
093    * Checks if a button with the specified text inside a container is enabled.
094    *
095    * @param componentType the button component type.
096    * @param container     the container holding the button.
097    * @param buttonText    the text of the button to check.
098    * @return true if the button is enabled; false otherwise.
099    */
100   @Override
101   public boolean isEnabled(final ButtonComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
102                            final String buttonText) {
103      LogUi.step("Checking if button is enabled: " + buttonText);
104      return buttonComponent(componentType).isEnabled(container, buttonText);
105   }
106
107   /**
108    * Checks if a button inside a container is enabled.
109    *
110    * @param componentType the button component type.
111    * @param container     the container holding the button.
112    * @return true if the button is enabled; false otherwise.
113    */
114   @Override
115   public boolean isEnabled(final ButtonComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container) {
116      LogUi.step("Checking if button is enabled in container");
117      return buttonComponent(componentType).isEnabled(container);
118   }
119
120   /**
121    * Checks if a button identified by its text is enabled.
122    *
123    * @param componentType the button component type.
124    * @param buttonText    the text of the button to check.
125    * @return true if the button is enabled; false otherwise.
126    */
127   @Override
128   public boolean isEnabled(final ButtonComponentType componentType, final String buttonText) {
129      LogUi.step("Checking if button is enabled: " + buttonText);
130      return buttonComponent(componentType).isEnabled(buttonText);
131   }
132
133   /**
134    * Checks if a button identified by a locator is enabled.
135    *
136    * @param componentType the button component type.
137    * @param buttonLocator the locator for the button.
138    * @return true if the button is enabled; false otherwise.
139    */
140   @Override
141   public boolean isEnabled(final ButtonComponentType componentType, final By buttonLocator) {
142      LogUi.step("Checking if button is enabled using locator: " + buttonLocator);
143      return buttonComponent(componentType).isEnabled(buttonLocator);
144   }
145
146   /**
147    * Checks if a button with the specified text inside a container is visible.
148    *
149    * @param componentType the button component type.
150    * @param container     the container holding the button.
151    * @param buttonText    the text of the button to check.
152    * @return true if the button is visible; false otherwise.
153    */
154   @Override
155   public boolean isVisible(final ButtonComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
156                            final String buttonText) {
157      LogUi.step("Checking if button is visible: " + buttonText);
158      return buttonComponent(componentType).isVisible(container, buttonText);
159   }
160
161   /**
162    * Checks if a button inside a container is visible.
163    *
164    * @param componentType the button component type.
165    * @param container     the container holding the button.
166    * @return true if the button is visible; false otherwise.
167    */
168   @Override
169   public boolean isVisible(final ButtonComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container) {
170      LogUi.step("Checking if button is visible in container");
171      return buttonComponent(componentType).isVisible(container);
172   }
173
174   /**
175    * Checks if a button identified by its text is visible.
176    *
177    * @param componentType the button component type.
178    * @param buttonText    the text of the button to check.
179    * @return true if the button is visible; false otherwise.
180    */
181   @Override
182   public boolean isVisible(final ButtonComponentType componentType, final String buttonText) {
183      LogUi.step("Checking if button is visible: " + buttonText);
184      return buttonComponent(componentType).isVisible(buttonText);
185   }
186
187   /**
188    * Checks if a button identified by a locator is visible.
189    *
190    * @param componentType the button component type.
191    * @param buttonLocator the locator for the button.
192    * @return true if the button is visible; false otherwise.
193    */
194   @Override
195   public boolean isVisible(final ButtonComponentType componentType, final By buttonLocator) {
196      LogUi.step("Checking if button is visible using locator: " + buttonLocator);
197      return buttonComponent(componentType).isVisible(buttonLocator);
198   }
199
200   /**
201    * Retrieves the Button instance for the given component type.
202    *
203    * @param componentType the button component type.
204    * @return the Button instance.
205    */
206   private Button buttonComponent(final ButtonComponentType componentType) {
207      return getOrCreateComponent(componentType);
208   }
209
210   /**
211    * Performs a table insertion action on a cell element using the button component.
212    *
213    * @param cellElement   the cell element where the button is located.
214    * @param componentType the button component type.
215    * @param values        optional values for the insertion action.
216    */
217   @Override
218   public void tableInsertion(final SmartWebElement cellElement, final ComponentType componentType,
219                              final String... values) {
220      if (!(componentType instanceof ButtonComponentType buttonType)) {
221         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Component type needs to be from: ButtonComponentType.");
222      }
223      LogUi.step("Performing table insertion in cell element");
224      buttonComponent(buttonType).clickElementInCell(cellElement);
225   }
226
227}
